sourcesContent:
import { useLocation } from "react-router" import "./singlePost.css" import { useEffect } from "react" import axios from "axios" import { useState } from "react" export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation() const path = location.pathname.split("/")[2] const [post, setPost] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const getPost = async () => { const res = await axios.get("/posts/"+path) setPost(res.data) } getPost() }, [path]) return (
{post.photo && ( )}

Supernova
